mapper.select:
SELECT r.cc_r_id,r.cc_r_speci, c.*, g.class_name FROM c_competition_record r JOIN class_register c ON r.cr_id = c.cr_id JOIN ruoyi.grade g ON c.class_id = g.class_id
AND cc_r_speci = #{speci}

SELECT s.stu_id, MAX(s.stu_name) AS stu_name, MAX(g.class_name) AS class_name, SUM(IF(cps.ps_audit = 2, 1, 0)) AS audit_2_count, SUM(IF(cps.ps_audit IN (1, 0), 1, 0)) AS audit_1_or_0_count FROM c_personnel_sheet cps JOIN student s ON cps.stu_id = s.stu_id JOIN grade g ON s.class_id = g.class_id JOIN c_ballteam cb ON cps.bal_id = cb.bal_id JOIN c_competition_record ccr ON cb.cc_r_id = ccr.cc_r_id WHERE ccr.cc_r_speci != '课内赛' GROUP BY cps.stu_id;

SELECT ccr.cc_r_id, ccr.cc_r_time, ccr.cc_r_name, cps.ps_audit FROM c_competition_record ccr JOIN c_ballteam cb ON ccr.cc_r_id = cb.cc_r_id JOIN c_personnel_sheet cps ON cb.bal_id = cps.bal_id WHERE cc_r_speci != '课内赛' AND cps.stu_id = #{stuId}

SELECT cps.stu_id, s.stu_name, cj.job_name, cps.ps_num, ccr.cc_r_speci, ccr.cc_r_name, ccr.cc_r_time, ccr.cc_r_place, sg.gg_name, cps.ps_num, GROUP_CONCAT(cps.ps_url SEPARATOR '; ') AS ps_urls FROM c_personnel_sheet cps JOIN student s ON cps.stu_id = s.stu_id JOIN c_job cj ON cps.job_id = cj.job_id JOIN c_ballteam cb ON cps.bal_id = cb.bal_id JOIN c_competition_record ccr ON cb.cc_r_id = ccr.cc_r_id JOIN stu_group sg ON cb.gg_id = sg.gg_id WHERE ccr.cc_r_speci != '课内赛' AND cps.stu_id = #{stuId} AND cps.ps_audit != 0 AND ccr.cc_r_id = #{ccrId} GROUP BY cps.stu_id, s.stu_name, cj.job_name, cps.ps_num, ccr.cc_r_speci, ccr.cc_r_name, ccr.cc_r_time, ccr.cc_r_place, sg.gg_name, cps.ps_num;
